Author: Koforia2
Comments: Major UI/UX improvements and complete Staff Management System implementation. Added Bill Generation report page with two-column layout featuring Report Parameters section and PDF viewer. Created comprehensive Staff Deactivation/Reactivation system with StaffDeactivationModal, StaffDeactivatedModal, and StaffReactivationModal components. Enhanced payment void security with Transaction ID and Customer # confirmation fields. Fixed critical UI issues including month picker overflow with MonthYearPickerPortal component, dropdown cutoff in deactivation modals, and data truncation in Staff list Role column. Added 9 Customer Visit Status pages and Customer Payment Status tracking pages. Improved responsive design for smaller screens, fixed parsing errors in BillGenerationPage, and enhanced staff ID validation to accept numbers with/without leading zeros. Created comprehensive DEVELOPMENT.md documentation covering project structure, architecture, component guidelines, and recent updates. Total: 33 files changed, 14952 insertions, 77 deletions

Author: Koforia2
Comments: Implemented comprehensive Dashboard Details pages and Customer Reactivation System. Created DashboardDetailsInactiveCustomersPage and DashboardDetailsCustomersInactiveThisYearPage with full customer management capabilities. Added professional ReactivationModal and DeactivationModal with two-step verification, form validation, and ModernSelect dropdown integration. Created ReactivatedCustomersPage with date range filtering, deactivation/reactivation tracking columns, and realistic mock data. Enhanced UI/UX with consistent modern dropdowns across all modals, optimized modal widths (DeactivationModal: 522px), and fixed DateRangePicker issues. Updated navigation system with new page types and Header component with correct page titles. Removed unnecessary UI elements (Add Customer buttons, Details column) for cleaner interface. Updated development documentation to version 3.4. Total: 43 files changed, 10634 insertions, 99 deletions

Author: Koforia2
Comments: Enhanced location modals across the application with new components (MeterReadingLocationModal, StorageTankLocationModal, PumpStationLocationModal). Updated Visit and Payment Transaction modals with improved UI. Integrated location modals into 5 meter reading and infrastructure pages. Added dynamic status indicators with green/red icons for operational status. Implemented Status column in Pump Station pages with color-coded display. Standardized labels across all modals (Staff Name, Reading, Meter Number, Reading Date). Created modals for Cheque, Receipt, Void Details, Deposit Receipt, and Success confirmations. Total: 56 files changed, 5059 insertions, 525 deletions

Author: Koforia2
Comments: Created PaymentsListPage and BankDepositsListPage with detailed transaction tables. Added navigation links for Payments and Bank Deposits submenus. Populated Payments page with 11 payment records and Bank Deposits page with 10 deposit records. Implemented proper table formatting with Status badges, Actions column with Receipt/GPS/Void icons arranged vertically. Enhanced UI with bold date formatting, currency display with thousands separators, and optimized table layout for browser viewport. Updated Header component for correct page titles. Added LogCustomerCallModal and EditCustomerPage components. Total: 14 files changed, 3580 insertions, 1071 deletions

Author: CWSA Admin
Comments: Fixed Bills page rendering issues and updated Bills table with actual bill data. Added missing Lucide React icon imports (Eye, Edit2, Trash2). Changed Bills table footer background to slate-700 to match header. Replaced placeholder data with 9 actual bill records including Period, Description, Current Bill, Bill Status, Amount Paid, Amount Due columns. Enhanced status display with green checkmarks and red X indicators. Updated all export functions to handle new bill data structure. Total: 5 files changed, 482 insertions, 4 deletions

Author: Kofor
Comments: Added Payments sub-page to Customer Details with functional export buttons (CSV, PDF, Copy, Print), search functionality, and sortable columns. Fixed parsing errors in CustomerDetailsPage. Updated icons to match Visits Details page. Added sorting indicator in table footer. Total: 9 files changed, 1451 insertions, 56 deletions

Author: Kwabena
Comments: Updated Customer Details page layout and navigation. Modified Dashboard and Header components for improved customer view handling. Added screenshot documentation. Total: 7 files changed, 88 insertions, 66 deletions

Author: Kwabena
Comments: Initial commit with complete CWSA Dashboard application. Includes all pages (Customers, Staff, Pump Stations, Storage Tanks, Meter Readings, GPS locations), charts, data visualization components, and export functionality. Full Next.js 15.4.6 setup with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Total: 72 files created, 25976 insertions
